short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep an eye on your account status, as well as set alerts for interest rates on Mango Markets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily view current borrow/lending rates as well as perpetual future funding rates on Mango Markets v3.

v0.2.1
Balance and health alerts for Mango Accounts have arrived!

v0.1.6
Support for adding Mango Accounts is here! Add your Mango Accounts by address in the extension, and keep a close eye on your balance and health ratio!

v0.1.0
You can now set notifications for any of the various interest rates on Mango Markets!

**** THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL MANGO MARKETS BROWSER EXTENSION ****
** PRODUCT IS PROVIDED AS-IS WITH NO GUARANTEES OF ACCURACY **
